articles.title: Technical View: Bears drags Nifty closer to 22,500; support at 22,370 - Moneycontrol
articles.description: The next crucial support level stands at 22370. On the upside 22620 – 22650 shall act as an immediate hurdle from short term perspective, says Jatin Gedia – Technical Research Analyst at Sharekhan by BNP Paribas.
articles.content: After hitting fresh high in the previous session (on April 10) the bears were back in action on Dalal Street and dragged the Nifty50 index by 1 percent on April 12, amid higher-than-expected US CPI d… [+2015 chars]
